communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Records sufficient to show copies of Parent Restriction letters issued from July 1, 2023 - June 30, 2024 for the following schools/instances:

1. Any letters issued by schools in Network Four:
Alcott Elementary
Audubon
Avondale-Logan
Barry
Bell
Blaine
Brentano
Burley
Chase
Darwin
Fisher
Franklin
Funston
Goethe
Greeley
Hamilton
Hawthorne
Inter-American
Jahn
Lasalle
Lincoln
Logan Square
Lorca
Manierre
Mayer
Mcauliffe
Mozart
Nettelhorst
Newberry
Nixon
Prescott
Reilly
Skinner North
Tubman
Von Linne

These may also be listed as "Violation of Visitor Protocol" letters. Please note that I am not seeking any personally identifiable information or otherwise exempt information. As required by the statute, please ensure that the requested documents are redacted rather than exempting the entirety of the document. Additionally, for any and all exemptions used to redact exempt information, please provide clear and convincing evidence for each exemption used by your agency.

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

title: Student Assignment: Tarantula File, SY24 + SY25

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting a copy of the tarantula file.

Please provide this file for SY 2023-2024 and 2024-2025. This is the file that shows whether a school has an attendance boundary, how many students attend the school, how many students reside in the boundary, how many reside in the boundary and attend the school, how many attend but don't reside, how many reside but don't attend, , etc.

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

title: Governance: Outside Law Firms, Cozen O'Connor, FOIA #2

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Governance: Outside Law Firms, Cozen O'Connor, FOIA #2
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Since January 1, 2025 through current:

1) Copies of all invoices from the Cozen O'Connor law firm;

2) Copies of records of payments by CPS/Chicago Board of Education to Cozen O'Connor law firm. I want the actual bills as well as proof of payment by the district.

3) Any and all letters of engagement, if changed from previous engagement letters, between CPS/Chicago Board of Education and Cozen O'Connor law firm, including any modifications or changes.

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
